seo.seoDescription: Hi there! I'm Son Seungyeol, a developer who deliver thoughts with code.

blocks.heroTitle: Hi there! I'm Son Seungyeol, a developer who seeks growth together.
blocks.heroSubtitle: Glad to meet you! I pursue growth through diverse and continuous experiences, and believe that greater learning can be gained by sharing knowledge, thus put the belief into action. Also, I believe that one line of code written today makes the world a better place than yesterday.
